thread.title: Ronnie
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Ronnie

author: Ronnie
title: Ronnie
text: Bought an 18" fit bmx bike for my son . Good quality , little disappointed in the wheels / tires , have quite a bit of wobble in them brand new . I would expect that from a cheap bike from walmart . Not from fit bike co. In the bmx world , nothing stays new for long . The bikes my other boys have had , verde , stolen , etc all started out very nice and true . I cannot fault the bike shop , as it came in a box to them . I know they would make it right , if we were local to them , and they would have assembled it .
